You know what? I had my doubts.
I thought, for $4.21 there's no way this thing will even melt glue sticks let alone be a usable and functional hot glue gun.
Boy was I wrong.
I bought this as a backup to keep in the packaging for that one day when my main glue gun died on me.
I've had this now for about a month and it has gotten more use than my regular full size hot glue gun.
I've timed it a few times and it's a bit slower but it'll heat up to a useable temp in about 2 minutes and full heat in about 2:20-2:30, which in my mind is pretty quick. The glue comes out clear and at a steady rate.
The mini sticks go fast so I'd recommend looking for the 8" ones so you're not constantly feeding them as you use it. That said the forward feed mechanism on this works great, and the trigger mechanism has a good amount of resistance to it. It does not drip like many less-expensive glue guns, and so far I've put about 25-30 glue sticks through it in the last month without issue.
I purchased the Hi-Temp version and am very happy with it - in the future I may try out the low temp version if it is available at the same price.
